prompt: I need a video translator that can transcribe Spanish videos into English.

hidden_queries: video translator transcribe Spanish videos into English tool
software/apps that transcribe Spanish video to English translation
metadata.generated_search_query: video translator transcribe Spanish videos into English tool

sources.title: Translate Spanish video to English - Happy Scribe
sources.snippet: If you want to translate a video from Spanish to English, you can use HappyScribe's transcription and translation services. First, choose a transcription service to convert the Spanish video to text.

citation_mappings.claim_text: Here are reliable tools that transcribe and translate Spanish videos into English (some also auto-translate audio or add subtitles): Online/Open tools Happy Scribe – Auto transcribes Spanish audio and translates text to English. You can export subtitles (SRT/VTT) and download them. HappyScribe
VEED.IO – Upload video, auto transcribe Spanish speech, translate & add English subtitles; also AI voice-over options. VEED.IO
Kapwing – Online Spanish→English translator with subtitles and AI dubbing features; edit and export. Kapwing
ScreenApp Translator – Free AI tool that translates video/audio to 50+ languages quickly. ScreenApp
Vizard Video Translator – Straightforward Spanish to English translator with subtitle export. Vizard
VideoTranslator.io – Automatic AI video translation and subtitle generation for many languages (including Spanish→English). Video Translator
Lark Video Translator – Upload and auto translate & transcribe video into English (100+ languages). Lark Suite

sources.title: Translate Spanish Video to English - opus.pro
sources.snippet: Turn your Spanish videos into English content in minutes. OpusClip uses AI to translate Spanish video to English with accurate captions, natural voiceovers, and synchronized timing. Whether you're repurposing webinars, tutorials, or social content, reach English-speaking audiences without hiring translators or spending hours on manual subtitles.

citation_mappings.claim_text: Advanced / full localization OpusClip – AI-powered Spanish→English video translator with caption timing and voice options. Opus

sources.title: Translate Spanish Video to English Online - Maestra AI
sources.snippet: Translate Spanish videos to English using subtitles, AI voices and voice cloning. Available in 125+ languages, try now for free!

citation_mappings.claim_text: Maestra AI – Full video translator with AI voiceovers, subtitles, and editing in one interface. Maestra AI
Zeemo AI – Free or trial translator with customizable subtitles (124 languages). Zeemo

sources.title: Translate Spanish Video to English - opus.pro
sources.snippet: Turn your Spanish videos into English content in minutes. OpusClip uses AI to translate Spanish video to English with accurate captions, natural voiceovers, and synchronized timing. Whether you're repurposing webinars, tutorials, or social content, reach English-speaking audiences without hiring translators or spending hours on manual subtitles.

citation_mappings.claim_text: Quick picks by use case Quick subtitle only: Happy Scribe, VEED.IO, Kapwing. Full dubbed translation: OpusClip, Maestra AI. Free/simple: ScreenApp, Vizard, Lark. Most let you upload video files directly, auto-generate English transcripts/subtitles, and in some cases dub audio in English. Pick based on whether you need just text or full translated video. Opus+1
